amendment.description: To increase the vote threshold required to waive a budget point of order prohibiting unfunded mandates in excess of limit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 538 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 538 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Wicker.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 538 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 538 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Wicker.
